sense.name: exist in a certain manner, mode, or style
sense.commentary: Note: Could be either a general mode of living or a specific set of experiences. Syntax Includes: NP1 LIVE ADVP NP1 LIVE PP NP1 LIVE NP2 Note: location, as in "He lived a thrilling life at sea," can be omitted without changing the meaning.
sense.examples: We had to live frugally after the war. Many people in the world have to live on $1 a day. She lived lavishly on her inheritence. He said Italians really know how to live. I lived through two divorces The holocaust survivors have lived a nightmare. He lived a thrilling life at sea. She lived a boring existence at the private school.

sense.name: inhabit, dwell
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1 LIVE PP{P NP[location]} Note: location cannot be omitted.
sense.examples: She lived in New Jersey all her life. For many years only a few people lived on that island. I live in a 220 year old house. The Anazazi Indians lived in cliffs above the desert floor. Who knows what evil lives in the hearts of men?

sense.name: survive, continue
sense.examples: The legend of Elvis lives on. We lived without water and food for 3 days. These superstitions live in the backwaters of America.

sense.name: have a mortal existence
sense.examples: My grandfather lived until the end of war. Tiny mammals lived during the age of dinosaurs. The terminally ill patient wished he could live to see his grandchild.

sense.name: Live_on
sense.examples: He lives on through his art. Elvis lives on in Vegas.

sense.name: live to the end
sense.examples: Let me live out my years in heat of blood! Stubborness helps Bears coach live out boyhood dream.

sense.name: work in a house where one doesn't live
sense.examples: If your nanny lives out, she's entitled to minimum wage. The maid lives out but comes and provides daily service.

sense.name: Live_down
sense.examples: You can never live this down! We couldn't stop laughing and he never lived it down.

sense.name: Live_in
sense.examples: If your nanny lives in, you do not have to pay minimum wage. Our trusted maid lives in and performs domestic duties.

sense.name: Live_it_up
sense.examples: It's your birthday, so let's live it up! Live it up on your next trip!

sense.name: Live_over
sense.examples: If I had my life to live over I'd pick more daisies.
